parameter.name: fileSystemName
parameter.description: The name of the file system.

parameter.name: filePathToUpload
parameter.description: The destination path in the file system where the file will be uploaded.

parameter.name: localFilePath
parameter.description: The local file path of the file to be uploaded.

parameter.name: textContent
parameter.description: Text content to be uploaded instead of a file.

parameter.name: overwriteBody
parameter.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the response of the operation.

parameter.name: contentType
parameter.description: The MIME content type of the content.

parameter.name: contentDisposition
parameter.description: The value of the Content-Disposition response header.

parameter.name: cacheControl
parameter.description: The value of the Cache-Control response header.

parameter.name: blockSize
parameter.description: The size of the block in MB.

parameter.name: maxSingleUploadSize
parameter.description: The maximum size of a single upload in bytes.

parameter.name: maxConcurrency
parameter.description: The maximum number of blocks that can be uploaded in parallel.
